well only if the SOURCE material is good: well 320 kbit mp3 and FLAC does not make much difference - right ?

It's a bit offtopic, but the fact of the matter is that FLAC is lossless, mp3 is lossy. At that high of a bitrate you might not be able to hear a noticeable difference, but for archiving purposes lossless >> lossy
I have almost my entire library in .mp3, but if I were a serious audiophile I would use FLAC for everything, because it's lossless.
